short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse to any Facebook profile from a hotlinked Facebook picture.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MirrorMirror allows a user to pivot from a hotlinked Facebook photo to the actual photo hosted on Facebook. MirrorMirror accomplishes this by searching a website after it has loaded for any pictures which have been hotlinked using Facebook’s Content Delivery Network (CDN). It then parses the photo ID out of the image URL and creates a link in the plug-in’s drop down display. Alternatively, a context menu is added when right-clicking on a hotlinked image allowing you to directly browse to that Facebook photo.
